name: PsyBall
description:
Psyball – It is hardcore psychedelic arcade game with fast and original gameplay. All you need is to throw your ball into the hole avoiding obstacles. It is like minigolf but you don't need to wait until ball stops and you have unlimited amount of hits.

  • 60 unique levels
  • Game plot about our multiverse
  • And endless game mode with level generator

Our universe's destiny is in your hands!
